name: GMX MAIL
tag_list: email, webmail, freemail, community, brainstorm, free-webmail, free-email, free-e-mail, e-mail
overview:
GMX is a free Webmail service for anyone wanting a new e-mail address and everyone seeking a powerful, highly reliable service that is open to ideas and innovation. The service has a vibrant Brainstorm community and interactive User Lab where users in the United States and Europe share ideas, influence the product roadmap, and test drive new options before they are released.

GMX has over 11 million active and outspoken users that are making sure GMX is outstanding Webmail. Users can have numerous e-mail accounts - including Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo! and others â€“ work in one familiar, personalized view. GMX also focuses on protecting against viruses, and the service ensures up to 98 percent fewer spam emails with one of the worldâ€™s best spam filters. Users have access to 5 GB of e-mail storage and an addtional GB online storage through a rich web interface or via POP or IMAP from a desktop e-mail program or any mobile device.

GMX Internet Services Inc. (Global Mail Exchange) is a wholly owned subsidiary of United Internet Group, a publicly listed company (ISIN DE0005089031) with a market cap of more than $7.4 billion and some 3,500 employees. GMX is a pioneer of communication via the Internet.
